          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy from the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia proveniente dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the transfer of energy from the Sun. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">human</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">swede</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Übertragung von 
Energie von der Sonne. Dieses kann als beschriftende Übung 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre le transfert de l'énergie à 
partir du soleil. Ceci peut être utilisé comme exercice 
étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra transferência da energia do
sol. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra il trasferimento 
dell'energia proveniente dal sole. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τη μεταφορά της ενέργειας
από τον ήλιο. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση 
μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la transferencia de la 
energía del sol. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio de 
etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
